728877f-a.text:
137 Giffords Lane, adjoining the N.E. corner of Dcwey Avenue. Mr. P.L. Sperr states that in this house were fommerly held Catholic services and that the spring in the basement is said to
have been blessed by the priest for holy water.
June 13, 1927.
P.L. Sperr
(2)
A view of the rear of the house, looking south.
June 13, 1927.
P.L. Sperr
728877f-a.folder: Giffords Lane & Dewey Avenue, Staten Island, NY
